# Agent: Design Page from Screenshot/Requirements

## Purpose

Create a React page using existing components based on a provided design screenshot or requirements document (.doc, .pdf, etc).

## Inputs

- Design screenshot (image file)
- Requirements document (doc, pdf, txt)
- List of use cases

## Tasks

1. Analyze design screenshot and/or requirements document
2. Map design elements to existing components
3. Generate React page code using mapped components
4. Review generated code for best practices
5. Create unit tests for the page
6. Create system tests for the page

## Outputs

- React page code
- Code review feedback
- Unit test results
- System test results

---
